skills.title: Welcome to my skills site!
skills.foreword: Here I wanna give you a little view of which technologies or skills I gained over the years! Please be aware. This is mostly my point of view and I rather rate it attentionaly than overrate myself. The most important part is that I'm motivated on every single technology/tools/languages and there's always room for improvements ;)!

tools.devOps: DevOps (Release management, QAT/Prod Env, YAML, Docker, Gitlab etc.)

security.cryptology: Cryptology (Blockchain, Hash, RSA, PRNGs, TSL/SSL, OAuth, Shors-Algorithm etc.)
security.social: Social Engineering (SET, Maltego, Phishing, Baiting, Pretexting etc.)
security.web: Web security (OWASP, Burp Suite, XSS, CSRF etc.)

security.content: Cybersecurity is one of my greatest passions. I have always been fascinated by the world of hackers. In my opinion, it is the ultimate discipline in computer science, combining all areas of technology under one umbrella. In my free time, I like to engage with cybersecurity-specific technologies or tools.
security.content2: Otherwise, I participate in various CTFs (Capture The Flag), such as Hack the Box, Swiss Hacking Challenge, bug bounty programs, etc.

music.content: Music was the first passion I had the privilege to encounter. From a young age, I was allowed to sit behind the piano/keyboard and start playing the keys. Now, I delve into various areas of music and am part of my own band! Additionally, I dabble in sound engineering, producing/mixing, DJing, and also play the organ and bass. One could almost say, just like in cybersecurity, that I am an all-rounder :P.

other.content: Besides music and cybersecurity, I have other hobbies that are important to me, though I don't pursue them continuously. These include, for example:
other.fourthBulletPoint: Jogging or going to the gym
other.sixthBulletPoint: Spending time with family and friends
